re.title: 合作单位要求
text: 支持开源的公司、高校、科研院所及其他机构。

re.title: 社区要求
text: 有活跃的开源软件仓库的社区或个人；
开源项目采用的协议需要是 OSI 组织认证的 或者 推荐的开放知识协议 等开放共享的协议

re.title: 学生要求
text: 年满 18 周岁的在校学生；
具有有效的学生证和身份证。

banner.title: Cooperation Partner
banner.text:

cooperation

banner.title: Community
banner.text:
Encourage more students and developers to join your community!
community participation guide

banner.title: Students
banner.text:
Contribute your code in this summer!
student guide

re.title: Requirements for cooperations partners
text: Welcome the companies, universities, research institutes and other institutions that support open source.

re.title: Requirements for community
text: Community or individual with active open source software repository;
The open source project should be relesaed with the license that has been approved by OSI or Recommended Open Knowledge License.

re.title: Requirements for students
text: Students over 18 years old with valid student card and ID card
